DOC.brief_summary: Impaired endometrial growth (thin endometrial thickness) is a critical factor for implantation failure. In this study, effects of vitamin E on endometrial growth are studied.
DOC.brief_title: Analysis of Implantation Failure and Establishment of Therapy for Implantation Failure
DOC.criteria: Endometrial thickness < 8 mm Women with fibroids Women receiving hormone therapy
